text: Hello, I'll explain, since a while I feel bad.
I was recommended your services so here I am !
It's been months that I live with my husband and everything is perfect !
It's happiness, he understands me, he suppots me and he's always there to listen to me.
However, it's been hell since ma step-mother came to live at our place.
I suspect she doesn't see our relation as a good thing.
I think you catch something, please continue
